name: Jack Frost (Shin Megami Tensei) Dashboard Icon
description: Exactly what it says on the tin, hee-ho.
additional_info: Tested on Google Chrome and Firefox. If you encounter a problem with this script, please don't hesitate to contact me on Tumblr. http://dimensionslip.tumblr.com/ v3 - 31/10/14 Applied CSS fix due to Tumblr's change in Dashboard CSS. Fixed problem with overlapping icons. v2 - 11/09/12 Applied CSS fix for those with blurry home icons. v1 - First released on 09/10/12
